pkgmetadata.longdescription: .. image:: https://travis-ci.org/Coverfox/cfblog.svg?branch=master :target: https://travis-ci.org/Coverfox/cfblog.. image:: https://www.quantifiedcode.com/api/v1/project/7d02a86019db4fda96fb2fb8fecce8d2/badge.svg :target: https://www.quantifiedcode.com/app/project/7d02a86019db4fda96fb2fb8fecce8d2 :alt: Code issuesWhat is cfblog?===============It is a blog engine with a peculiar CMS feature, that allows very complexcontent to be easily created.Installation============.. code:: bash $ pip install cfblogContributors============* Amit Upadhyay (https://github.com/amitu)* Vinay Karanam (https://github.com/vinayinvicible)ChangeLog=========https://github.com/Coverfox/cfblog/blob/master/ChangeLog.rstLICENSE=======* BSD
